I had the client bug and prevent me from loading into the game, and when I went to load into the game after restarting the client it was already remade. I lost 20 LP. I talked to support they helped me fix the issue and said that they cannot give LP ever because it would alter ranked. Makes no sense as I was playing games all day with no issues and the only person to lose LP was me so it was altered already. over the season I have probably lost 200+ LP on AFK's, trolls, and 2 random DC's (1 was my fault but my computer hard drive died lol). Either way ranked is already altered with the shit that goes on can we get back some of our damn LP for stupid shit. So hard to gain so easy to lose.
I agree! I am a victim too!
